title: why does my league interface appear really small? (mini map, options menu)
body: I cant seem to change the size to my liking in the new client. I have a lenova yoga 900

replies.body:
League doesn't full support resolutions over 1920x1080 just yet. Since this laptop runs a 3200x1800 resolution, you may notice some element scale oddly. Some players have managed to have the UI scale alright if they run the game in a Full Screen mode under your **VIDEO settings** in-game and avoid *Alt+Tabbing* out of the game. If this doesn't end up working for you, I'd recommend [changing your Windows display resolution](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/4910-screen-resolution-display-change-windows-10-a.html) and your in-game resolution to 1920x1080 or 1920x1200.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Not sure, do you have a screenshot?  What happens if you try pressing **Ctrl + Up Arrow** on the client?  Let me know if that helps!
